welcome_screen.title: Discover Your Dream City Quiz!
welcome_screen.subtitle: Find out which city matches your personality.

questions.question: You have a free weekend and a ticket to anywhere. What's your plan?

answers.text: Explore historical landmarks and museums
answers.description: You have a thirst for history and culture.

answers.text: Hit the beach and soak up some sun
answers.description: You're all about relaxation and enjoying the natural beauty.

questions.question: What's your ideal way to spend an evening in the city?

answers.text: Dinner at a top-rated restaurant
answers.description: Culinary adventures are your jam.

answers.text: Attending a live concert or show
answers.description: You live for the arts and entertainment.

answers.text: Warm and sunny
answers.description: You thrive in sunshine and clear skies.

answers.text: Cold and snowy
answers.description: You love the magic of winter and cozy atmospheres.

questions.question: How do you feel about public transportation?

answers.text: I love it, it's eco-friendly and efficient
answers.description: You're all for cities with great metro systems.

answers.text: I prefer to drive or cycle
answers.description: You enjoy the freedom of navigating the city your way.

answers.text: A cozy apartment in the city center
answers.description: Urban living at its finest is your preference.

answers.text: A quiet house in the suburbs
answers.description: You appreciate the peace and space of suburban life.

questions.question: What kind of outdoor activities do you enjoy?

answers.text: Hiking and exploring nature
answers.description: You're an adventurer at heart who loves the great outdoors.

answers.text: City parks and outdoor cafes
answers.description: You enjoy the blend of nature with city life.

answers.text: I love going out to bars and clubs
answers.description: Nightlife is your playground.

answers.text: I prefer quiet evenings or small gatherings
answers.description: You enjoy the serene side of the night.

questions.question: How important is food diversity to you?

answers.text: Very important, I love trying different cuisines
answers.description: A foodie who seeks culinary adventures in every corner.

answers.text: Not very, I stick to what I like
answers.description: You prefer the comfort of familiar tastes.

questions.question: How do you feel about crowds?

answers.text: I'm energized by busy places
answers.description: The hustle and bustle of crowded spaces excite you.

answers.text: I prefer quieter, less crowded areas
answers.description: Peace and space are what you seek in a city.

questions.question: What's your preference for arts and culture?

answers.text: I love museums, galleries, and theaters
answers.description: The arts and cultural scene is a big draw for you.

answers.text: I'm not very interested in those
answers.description: You have other interests that capture your heart.

results.title: Cultural Explorer
results.description: Cities rich in history and culture like Paris or Rome are calling your name!

results.title: Beach Lover
results.description: You're most at home in sunny, laid-back cities like Barcelona or Honolulu.

results.title: Urban Night Owl
results.description: Vibrant cities with bustling nightlife like New York or Tokyo are your playground.
